MIOTWEB Technologies Pvt. Ltd. & Headway Techies are privately held IT Solution Provider Companies formed in 2014.
Responsibilities:

  • Help teams with designs and reviews

As a freelance trainer, I have taken various training on JavaScript, Perl and related training. Below are the few of the training I have conducted.

Cybage Software is a technology consulting organization specializing in outsourced product engineering services.
